entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
